Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 7
Description: Papyrus Anastasi VII; sheet 6; Hieratic text both sides. Hymn to the Inundation.
Curator's comments: For edition of the Hymn to the Inundation: W. Helck, Der Text des "Nilhymnus", KÄT, Wiesbaden 1972; D. van der Plas, L'Hymne à la crue du Nil, EU 4, Leiden 1986, passim und Bd. II, 158-161. This manuscript is available on T.L.A (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/) Translation: M. Lichtheim, Ancient Egyptian Literature. Volume I: The Old and Middle Kingdoms, Berkeley, Los Angeles, London, 1973 (=1975), 204-210. col 11 Hymn to the Inundation = ed Helck 10a-13g col 12 Hymn to the Inundation = ed Helck 13g-14g col 12.3: colophon
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381206) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381206)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, split Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Unsupported locally Repaired: glassine paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (cracked) Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair
